verses.verse: וּבְהַפִּֽילְכֶ֨ם <S%H5307><s%> uv-hap-pi-le-Chem Moreover when ye shall divide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz by lot the land בְּנַחֲלָ֗ה <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-Lah, for inheritance תָּרִימוּ֩ <S%H7311><s%> ta-ri-Mu ye shall offer תְרוּמָ֨ה <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mah an oblation לַיהוָ֥ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD קֹדֶשׁ֮ <S%H6944><s%> ko-Desh an holy portion מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָאָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-Retz of the land אֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech, the length חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah of five וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> 'e-lef thousand אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech, [shall be] the length וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav [reeds] and the breadth עֲשָׂ֣רָה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Sa-rah [shall be] ten אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef; thousand קֹדֶשׁ־ <S%H6944><s%> ko-desh- This [shall be] holy ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol- all גְּבוּלָ֖הּ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lah in all the borders סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. thereof round about

יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become מִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh of this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh, Of this there shall be for the sanctuary חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh five מֵא֛וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred בַּחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ba-cha-Mesh [in length] with five מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred מְרֻבָּ֣ע <S%H7251><s%> me-rub-Ba' [in breadth] square סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv; round about וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty אַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah, cubits מִגְרָ֥שׁ <S%H4054><s%> mig-Rash for the suburbs ל֖וֹ lo סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- this הַמִּדָּ֤ה <S%H4060><s%> ham-mid-Dah And of this measure הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> haz-zoT thou תָּמ֔וֹד <S%H4058><s%> ta-Mod, shalt thou measure אֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech, the length; חֲמֵשׁ cha-mesh כחֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah fif קוְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret of ten אֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim; thousand וּבֽוֹ־ u-vov- יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> ham-mik-Dash and in it shall be the sanctuary קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh [and] the most קָדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shim. holy

קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh The holy מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz [portion] of the land ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he לַכֹּ֨הֲנִ֜ים <S%H3548><s%> lak-Ko-ha-Nim shall be for the priests מְשָׁרְתֵ֤י <S%H8334><s%> me-sha-re-Tei the ministers הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <S%H4720><s%> ham-mik-Dash of the sanctuary יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh, become הַקְּרֵבִ֖ים <S%H7131><s%> hak-ke-re-Vim which shall come near לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <S%H8334><s%> le-sha-Ret to minister אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become לָהֶ֤ם la-Hem מָקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> ma-kOm and it shall be a place לְבָ֣תִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> le-Vat-Tim, for their houses וּמִקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> u-mik-Dash and an holy place לַמִּקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H4720><s%> lam-mik-Dash. for the sanctuary

וַחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah And the five וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> 'e-lef thousand אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech, of length וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> va-'a-Se-ret and the ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand רֹ֑חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav; of breadth; יִהְיֶה yih-yeh כוְֽהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become קלַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim shall also the Levites מְשָׁרְתֵ֨י <S%H8334><s%> me-sha-re-Tei the ministers הַבַּ֧יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like לַאֲחֻזָּ֖ה <S%H272><s%> la-'a-chuz-Zah have for themselves for a possession עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim for twenty לְשָׁכֹֽת׃ <S%H3957><s%> le-sha-Chot. chambers

וַאֲחֻזַּ֨ת <S%H272><s%> va-'a-chuz-Zat the possession הָעִ֜יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city תִּתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu, And ye shall appoint חֲמֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> cha-Me-shet five אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand רֹ֔חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav, broad וְאֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> ve-'O-rech, long חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah and five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand לְעֻמַּ֖ת <S%H5980><s%> le-'um-Mat over against תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mat the oblation הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh; of the holy לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol the whole בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit [portion] it shall be for the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. become

וְלַנָּשִׂ֡יא <S%H5387><s%> ve-lan-na-Si And a [portion shall be] for the prince מִזֶּ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh either וּמִזֶּה֩ <S%H2088><s%> u-miz-Zeh side לִתְרוּמַ֨ת <S%H8641><s%> lit-ru-Mat on the one side and on the other side of the oblation הַקֹּ֜דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh of the holy וְלַאֲחֻזַּ֣ת <S%H272><s%> ve-la-'a-chuz-Zat [portion] and of the possession הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, of the city אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before תְרֽוּמַת־ <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-mat- the oblation הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh of the holy וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to פְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei [portion] and before אֲחֻזַּ֣ת <S%H272><s%> 'a-chuz-Zat the possession הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, of the city מִפְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> mip-pe-'at- side יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> yam from the west יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah, westward וּמִפְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> u-mip-pe-'at- side קֵ֖דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah and from the east קָדִ֑ימָה <S%H6921><s%> ka-Di-mah; eastward וְאֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> ve-'O-rech, and the length לְעֻמּוֹת֙ <S%H5980><s%> le-'um-mOt [shall be] over against אַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad one הַחֲלָקִ֔ים <S%H2506><s%> ha-cha-la-Kim, of the portions מִגְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> mig-ge-Vul border יָ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> yam from the west אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul border קָדִֽימָה׃ <S%H6921><s%> ka-Di-mah. unto the east

לָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz In the land יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become לּ֥וֹ lo לַֽאֲחֻזָּ֖ה <S%H272><s%> la-'a-chuz-Zah shall be his possession בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El; in Israel וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- shall no יוֹנ֨וּ <S%H3238><s%> yo-Nu shall no more oppress ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer נְשִׂיאַי֙ <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'Ai and my princes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi, my people וְהָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz and [the rest of] the land יִתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> yit-te-Nu shall they give לְבֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- to the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְשִׁבְטֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7626><s%> le-shiv-tei-Hem. according to their tribes ס sa-Mek

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- Let it suffice לָכֶם֙ la-Chem נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'Ei you O princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel חָמָ֤ס <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas violence וָשֹׁד֙ <S%H7701><s%> va-Shod and spoil הָסִ֔ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> ha-Si-ru, remove וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-Pat judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> u-tze-da-Kah and justice עֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su; and execute הָרִ֤ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> ha-Ri-mu take away גְרֻשֹֽׁתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1646><s%> ge-ru-sho-tei-Chem your exactions מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi, from my people נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD

מֹֽאזְנֵי־ <S%H3976><s%> mo-ze-nei- balances צֶ֧דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek Ye shall have just וְאֵֽיפַת־ <S%H374><s%> ve-'ei-fat- ephah צֶ֛דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek and a just וּבַת־ <S%H1324><s%> u-vat- bath צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek and a just יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi shall have לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

[are] an homer
